title: wrnet: Regularized win ratio regression through elastic net
text: WRNet is a machine-learning approach to regularize win ratio regression for hierarchical composite endpoints. It optimizes variable selection and risk prediction through an elastic net-type penalty on the regression coefficients (log-win ratios).
